titleStmt.title: Herōologia Anglica hoc est clarissimorum et doctissimorum. aliqout [sic] Anglorum, qui floruerunt ab anno Cristi. M.D. vsq[ue] ad presentem annum M.D.C.XX viuæ effigies vitæ et elogia: duobus tomis. Authore. H.H. Anglo-Britanno: impensis Crispini Passæi calcographi [sic], et Iansonij bibliopolæ Arnhemiensis.
titleStmt.author: Holland, Henry, 1583-1650?
Passe, Crispijn van de, ca. 1565-1637, engraver.
Passe, Magdalena van de, 1600-ca. 1638, engraver.
Passe, Willem van de, 1598-ca. 1637, engraver.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Jan Jansson at the expenses of Crispijn van de Passe and Jan Jansson for Henry Holland, London,

notesStmt.note: The title page is engraved by Crispijn van de Passe; the portraits are engraved by Willem and Magdalena van de Passe.
The first "o" in "Herōologia" is a Greek omega.
Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Variant: with an unsigned leaf of verses by I. Gruterus inserted in the first quire.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
